name: Raticate

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.text: Does damage to the Defending Pokémon equal to half the Defending Pokémon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).

flavorText: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It seems to slow down if they are cut off.

strengths: Super Fang always does half remaining HP
Bite is efficient at 20 for 1 energy
Colorless attacks work with any energy
weaknesses: Super Fang less effective as damage stacks
synergies: Double Colorless Energy - Powers Super Fang
counters: Low HP Pokemon - Super Fang does little damage

competitiveHistory: Raticate's Super Fang was a unique attack that always dealt half the defender's remaining HP. This made it excellent against high-HP Pokemon but less useful as damage accumulated. It saw occasional tech use.

rulings.ruling: Super Fang does damage equal to half the Defending Pokemon's REMAINING HP, rounded up to nearest 10.
If defender has 100 HP remaining, Super Fang does 50 damage. If defender has 70 HP, Super Fang does 40 damage (35 rounded up).
